pr_title: SAK-41938 Forum Tool: Check boxes are not associated to parent label

timeline.message: SAK-41938 Forum Tool: Check boxes are not associated to parent label

timeline.bodyText:
This can be done directly in the JSF markup now that we're on a newer version of JSF. All that's needed is to add the passthrough lib import on the page:
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"
      xmlns:h="http://java.sun.com/jsf/html"
      xmlns:p="http://java.sun.com/jsf/passthrough">

Then you can use the prefix to add any arbitrary attribute on the tag that you don't want to be processed by the JSF rendering engine:
<h:outputLabel id="forum_locked_label" value="#{msgs.cdfm_lock_forum}" p:aria-labelledby="forum_posting_head...." />
timeline.author: bjones86
